column5: YOU WILL FIND in the DIARIES a LOT of POLITICS AND EVEN MORE CATS     THE PERSON who MAKES the FIRST COMMENT WILL GET TWO CATS EVERY PERSON WHO COMMENTS WILL GET A CAT     RULES IN THE DIARY WHEN YOU FIND SOMETHING in the DIARY that you LIKE YOU CAN REPOST IT AS COMMENT in the DIARY  PRESIDENT JOE BIDEN For the new issue of @NYMag I wrote about how the Biden White House polices language in Washington: https://t.co/SjLZLAkEi8  Biden to cancel Trump proposal to require immigrants' eye scans voice prints and DNA samples https://t.co/5acrAXVe7T pic.twitter.com/VKLAgMnZrx  ENERGY  @SecGranholm Energy @SecGranholm: "We have got to go big on America. That means we have to invest in this American Jobs Plan." https://t.co/xGUFF1wav2 pic.twitter.com/KBrXvSDDvS  JEN PSAKI Jen Psaki: Today the U.S. announced that it will join the Christchurch Call to Action to Eliminate Terrorist and Violent Extremist Content Online a global pledge by member governments and tech partners to work together to address terrorist and violent extremist content online.  CHUCK SCHUMER Chuck Schumer wants President Biden to cancel $50000 in student loan debt to support veterans.The president "is moving in our direction" Schumer says.https://t.co/01OjfEF51Y  MICHELLE OBAMA Michelle Obama to CBS: "All those Black Lives Matters kids they'd rather not have to worry about this. They're takin' to the streets because they have to. They're tryin' to have people understand that we're real folks. And the fear that many have of so many of us is irrational."  Obamas mourn loss of dog Bo https://t.co/94DWKegwor pic.twitter.com/yUoy3X4S2C  STACEY ABRAMS Stacey Abrams to CBS on her presidential ambitions: "Do I hold it as an ambition? Absolutely ... I have a responsibility to say 'Yes' for every young woman every person of color who sees me and decides what they're capable of based on what I think I am capable of."  DEVIN NUNES’S ATTORNEY Devin Nunes's attorney has been sanctioned and ordered to pay CNN $21000 for filing a "frivolous" defamation claim. https://t.co/YJX7CWXGMD  DEMOCRATIC AND GOP STAFF Democratic and GOP staff in Congress are drafting language for police-overhaul legislation that would limit the transfer of military equipment ban use of chokeholds except in life-threatening situations and set federal standards for no-knock warrants. https://t.co/N2aZjotvvJ  ELISE STEFANIK Republican Elise Stefanik once harshly blasted Trump's rhetoric and policies.Stefanik criticized Trump over everything from his comments about Muslims and women to his positions on reforming NATO building a border wall and cooperating with Russia. https://t.co/73ZkQLLQgY  MICHAEL COHEN WATCH: Michael Cohen on Giuliani's legal fees: He won't get "two cents" from Trump https://t.co/STlq6ymhiD pic.twitter.com/WJUENjPBT0  OKLAHOMA Oklahoma has secured a $2.6 million refund for a purchase of hydroxychloroquine — the Trump-touted malaria drug that health officials warned should not be prescribed for treating COVID. https://t.co/t5eN2WGdyT  MILWAUKEE The Milwaukee Fire and Police Commission has voted unanimously to completely ban chokeholds no exceptions. https://t.co/4Ko7fMxKvC
